channel.title: file-manager on Paolo Prem
channel.description: Recent content in file-manager on Paolo Prem

item.title: Goodbye ranger, welcome lf!
item.description: When I first saw Ranger, I immediately loved it. You can manage your files entirely from your command line in an awesome way. Here is a screenshot taken from their official repository: Its biggest flaw? Python! I started using it instead of the cd command to navigate through my filesystem and I noticed an incredibly annoying 1/2 seconds delay before its interface appears on my terminal. This is the reason I started to look for some faster alternatives.
